attributes.action: Revoke the TV licence using legislation
attributes.additional_details: The TV Licence is not required as many people no longer watch the BBC preferring to watch other media sources and listen to many of there radio stations especially the overseas service this is seen as the british public paying for a service they dont need or use. This is also seen as a unfair tax on those on low income which usually results in many being prosecuted for non payment putting them further in debt and possible jail.
attributes.background: We wish the government to end the TV Licence as soon as possible

departments.name: Department for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport
